description:
In order to create a mission of “Simplified and easy-to-use global payment” and “Serving the world”, we are committed to making IST a global free-flowing, encrypted digital asset, building a payment platform between IST online merchants and consumers.

Through the network of the platform, customers can achieve real-time p2p payments, transfers, and even various financial investments without the need for central organization and management, and support the exchange of fiat currencies between different countries.
name: Intelligent Strategic Transaction
